articles.title: Ex-Google engineer Linwei Ding guilty of stealing AI trade secrets for China
articles.description: Linwei Ding found guilty of economic espionage for China involving theft of Google's artificial intelligence technology.
articles.content:
A federal jury has found a former Google engineer guilty of stealing artificial intelligence (AI) trade secrets and spying for Chinese tech companies, ending a high-profile Silicon Valley trial.
As detailed in court documents obtained by FOX Business... [3232 chars]

articles.title: CJI launches digital initiatives to enhance operational efficiency, reduce pendency
articles.description: chief justice of india surya kant on thursday announced a series of technology-driven administrative initiatives aimed at enhancing operational efficiency in the judiciary and reducing pendency of cases. the cji, at the outset of the day’s proceedings, made the announcement. “there is some good news. we are trying to harness ai for increasing operational efficiency and reduce case pendency. “we have launched a digital partnership with various high courts which will have a platform that will alter the status
articles.content:
NEW DELHI :
CHIEF Justice of India Surya Kant on Thursday announced a series of technology-driven administrative initiatives aimed at enhancing operational efficiency in the judiciary and reducing pendency of cases. The CJI, at the outset of the day’... [1346 chars]

articles.title: Exclusive-Pentagon clashes with Anthropic over military AI use - sources
articles.description: WASHINGTON/SAN FRANCISCO, Jan 29 (Reuters) - The Pentagon and artificial-intelligence developer Anthropic are at odds over ‌potentially eliminating safeguards that might allow the government to use its technology to target weapons ‌autonomously and conduct U.S. domestic surveillance, three people familiar with the matter told Reuters.
articles.content: WASHINGTON/SAN FRANCISCO, Jan 29 (Reuters) - The Pentagon and artificial-intelligence developer Anthropic are at odds over ‌potentially eliminating safeguards that might allow the government to use its technology to target weapons ‌autonomously and c... [2378 chars]

articles.title: US reaffirms strong energy partnership with India at IEW 2026 in Goa
articles.description: The US reaffirmed its energy partnership with India at India Energy Week 2026 in Goa, focusing on expanding trade, infrastructure and technology cooperation. US officials discussed increasing energy imports, LNG and civil nuclear collaboration, while both sides highlighted innovation and smart energy systems to strengthen energy security.
articles.content: Mumbai (Maharashtra) [India], January 30 (ANI): The United States government reaffirmed its commitment to a strong, results-oriented energy partnership with India during India Energy Week (IEW) 2026, held from January 27 to 30 in Goa, with engagement... [2159 chars]

articles.title: Tech orientation programme on cultivation of silkworms
articles.description: Varanasi: A three-day technology orientation programme on Diversity and Cultivation of Economically Important Silkworms is being organised at Rajiv Ga.

articles.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq down as tech AI budgets trigger flight
articles.description: A weak technology sector has weighed on US stocks as disappointing earnings reports and hefty AI budgets spooked...
articles.content:
Both the S&P 500 and the ‍technology-heavy Nasdaq have closed lower at the end of US trading. Photo: AP PHOTO
The S&P 500 and the ‍technology-heavy Nasdaq have closed lower as investors became rattled by the latest earnings reports and worried about ... [6668 chars]
